isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - CAB DOOR COURTESY LIGHT ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Cab Door Courtesy Light Assembly

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove courtesy light mounting screws (Item 7) from courtesy light assembly (Item 8) and remove courtesy light assembly from cab door lower trim panel (Item 3).

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Courtesy Light Assembly

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove courtesy light mounting screws (Item 9) from courtesy light assembly (Item 10) and remove courtesy light assembly from cab door lower trim panel (Item 5).
